text: welcome back the Q&A chat bot also makes
it very easy to extend the experience
using Alexa you can easily create an
Alexis skill by following a few quick
steps let's take a look to get started
you will need to log in to your Amazon
developer account if you do not have one
you can easily create one by going to
developer amazin comm after successfully
logging in to your Amazon developer
account click on the Alexa menu and
select Alexa Skills kit from the menu
option this will be the home for all of
the Alexa skills that you will create
and manage in this developer account
click on create skill and give the skill
a name in this video we will use demo
skill 0-1 as the name of the skill keep
the default selected options and create
the skill now for Alexa to talk to the
needed back-end resources we will need
some additional information we will find
this in the QA chat bot designer
navigate to the QA chat bot designer
console and click on the menu icon and
select Alexa from the options follow the
guided pages and copy the lambda AR n to
your clipboard in the Alexa console
click on end point in the left
navigation bar of the interaction model
select a WS lambda AR n for the service
end point the end point is how your
skill will talk to your business logic
code or in this case the business logic
for the chat bot paste the AWS lambda AR
n in the default region text box and
then click on save end points we now
have one last thing to do to complete
the skill
doubt or set up the skills custom
interaction model switch to the QA chat
bot designer and navigate to the
configure skill schema screen and copy
the schema to your clipboard now in your
Lexus skill console we will update the
skill with a custom interaction model by
pasting the schema in the json editor
click on save model and then click on
build model this will take a few seconds
to complete
[Music]
once the build process completes you
will see a build complete message we
will now use the Alexus simulator to
test the Alexa experience click on the
test menu option and enable testing QA
is the invocation name we used in our
skill this is what the user can use to
open or ask the skill a question you can
easily change that to something else
that you would like to use let's test
out the experience you could see that
Alexa is now using the same Q&A chat bot
for answering and providing answers to
the questions feel free to try more
questions using Alexa thanks for
watching
